## BorrowingOperationOptionalParams interface

Optional parameters of a transaction that borrows ARTH.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface BorrowingOperationOptionalParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [borrowingFeeDecayToleranceMinutes?](./arth-ethers.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.borrowingfeedecaytoleranceminutes.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Control the amount of extra gas included attached to the transaction. |
|  [maxBorrowingRate?](./arth-ethers.borrowingoperationoptionalparams.maxborrowingrate.md) | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Maximum acceptable [borrowing rate](./arth-base.fees.borrowingrate.md) (default: current borrowing rate plus 0.5%). |
